nodes.text: A Gamorrean debtor lived in Cloud City and in the year 3 ABY owed a debt to the Duros Elad Zhalto. Duros hired Isabalia to beat out the debt.

The Gamorrean debtor was first mentioned in "Beyond the Clouds", a short story by Lilliam Rivera that was published in the 2020 anthology From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back. The character was initially revealed but not identified in a promotional tweet from Del Rey's account for Star Wars books.
